response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional piece that I believe would greatly benefit you, just like it has for many others. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This represents a significant savings compared to the standard price of $12,000. I trust you'll find this offer compelling and hope we can bring this valuable product into your possession soon.", "product_price": 10800}
